Ebbro P-4 P419 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 2001 JGTC Series GT500 Class 5th Place M. Krumm/T. Tanaka

Purchased: 2014

Michael Krumm & Tetsuya Tanaka raced for Nissan Team Nismo in the 2001 JGTC Series. Their only win was in round 4 at Mt. Fuji and they finished 5th overall in the GT500 class. This was Tanaka's first JGTC win and Krumm's 4th.
